AzureBlade received a transmission. He was trying to find out which 
was more important between the life of this scout or the City under 
attack. He felt her spark.

AzureBlade:
Maximals of Maximal city, I will go to rescue a fellow maximal. I 
shall come back soon enough to help you fight. AzureBlade out.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> She tried to struggle, but quickly found it useless. The dragon had 
> too strong a grip on her.  She tired her last ditch effort. She 
> opened her comlink. A small wire popped out of her ear and went down 
> infront of her mouth. She called out on every maximal frequency. She 
> knew she'd only have a few seonds to transmit before they stopped 
> her. "Maximal Scout Panzer needs assistance in the Black Fortress! 
> Will be reprogrammed in minutes! Please assist!REPEAT! MAXIMAL NEEDS 
> HELP IN THE BLACK FORTRESS!" She prayed to the matrix that some bot 
> out there heard her and would get here in time. 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:

with

a
